languages.text: "Песнь священных механизмов содержит ошибку. Обнаружены следы вмешательства..."

traits.locale_text: "Песнь священных механизмов содержит ошибку. Обнаружены следы вмешательства..."

languages.text: "The chant of the sacred mechanisms contains an error. Detecting evidence of tampering—"
languages.original_text: "Песнь священных механизмов содержит ошибку. Обнаружены следы вмешательства..."

traits.locale_text: "The chant of the sacred mechanisms contains an error. Detecting evidence of tampering—"

"The chant of the sacred mechanisms contains an error. Detecting evidence of tampering—"
"The chant of the sacred mechanisms contains an error. Detecting evidence of tampering—"

languages.text: « Le chant des mécaniques sacrées comporte une erreur. Détection d'indices de manipulation... »
languages.original_text: "The chant of the sacred mechanisms contains an error. Detecting evidence of tampering—"

traits.locale_text: « Le chant des mécaniques sacrées comporte une erreur. Détection d'indices de manipulation... »

languages.text: “神圣机械的吟唱声音包含错误，正在检测篡改的相关痕迹——”
languages.original_text: "The chant of the sacred mechanisms contains an error. Detecting evidence of tampering—"

traits.locale_text: “神圣机械的吟唱声音包含错误，正在检测篡改的相关痕迹——”

languages.text: 「聖なる機構の詠唱にエラーがある。改ざんの証拠を検出…」
languages.original_text: "The chant of the sacred mechanisms contains an error. Detecting evidence of tampering—"

traits.locale_text: 「聖なる機構の詠唱にエラーがある。改ざんの証拠を検出…」

languages.text: "Der Gesang der heiligen Mechanismen enthält einen Fehler. Erkenne Beweise für Sabotage ..."
languages.original_text: "The chant of the sacred mechanisms contains an error. Detecting evidence of tampering—"

traits.locale_text: "Der Gesang der heiligen Mechanismen enthält einen Fehler. Erkenne Beweise für Sabotage ..."

languages.text: «El cántico de los sagrados mecanismos contiene un error. Detecto evidencias de manipulación...».
languages.original_text: "The chant of the sacred mechanisms contains an error. Detecting evidence of tampering—"

traits.locale_text: «El cántico de los sagrados mecanismos contiene un error. Detecto evidencias de manipulación...».

languages.text: "Kutsal mekanizma ilahisinde bir hata meydana gelmiş. Onaysız değişiklik bulgusu tespit ediliyor..."
languages.original_text: "The chant of the sacred mechanisms contains an error. Detecting evidence of tampering—"

traits.locale_text: "Kutsal mekanizma ilahisinde bir hata mevcut. Onaysız değişiklik bulgusu tespit ediliyor..."
